sentence: FIRST ON FOX: The Republican PAC Winning for Women is endorsing House candidates Amanda Adkins in Kansas and Lisa Scheller in Pennsylvania Wednesday, marking the group's third round of endorsements in the 2022 cycle.
author: Tyler Olson
title: GOP women's PAC endorses Amanda Adkins, Lisa Scheller to take on Democrat House incumbents in midterms

sentence: CLF is also endorsing Scott Baugh in California's 47th Congressional District, a Democratic controlled open seat; Tom Barrett in Michigan's 7th District, where Democratic Rep. Elissa Slotkin’s running for re-election; Tyler Kistner in Minnesota's 2nd District, where Democratic incumbent Angie Craig is seeking another term; Alex Skarlatos in Oregon's 4th District, a Democratic controlled open seat; and Lisa Scheller in Pennsylvania 7th, where Democratic Rep. Susan Wild’s running for re-election.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Top outside group backing House Republicans makes second round of 2022 GOP endorsements
2022 shaping up to be another banner year for Republican women, candidates say

author: Kelly Laco
title: RNC contrasts Dem support of 'woke' Disney to GOP backing of American values heading into 2022 midterms
